1604065509_mirrored_ghost_github.body: is there any way to clone Antilibrary site i found it very interesting i want to clone it and use Hindu books

topic.title: Please i need help
topic.body:
I am running ZeroNet on my localhost using ubuntu and i want my site from another computer which is not running ZeroNet..................

Ex: Computher 1 running ZeroNet on port 43110
      Computer 2 accessing ZeroNet site from computer one on port 8080 " something like that"
